Apple is where imaginations gather together, committing to the values that lead to great work. Every product we build, service we develop, or Apple Store experience we deliver is the result of us making each other’s ideas stronger. That happens because every one of us shares a belief that we can make something wonderful and share it with the world, changing lives for the better. It’s the diversity of our people and their thinking that encourages the innovation that runs through everything we do. When we bring everybody in, we can do the best work of our lives. Here, you’ll do more than join something — you’ll add something.

We are looking for a talented expert and innovation-driven team member to manage key international marketing programmes for our first party apps businesses, with a focus on offers for an 11 month fixed term position. The best candidate should demonstrate outstanding skills managing complex internal partnerships, strong attention to detail, be resourceful, adaptable, creative, and results-oriented. 

Description
-  Define plans for our international marketing initiatives for offers, that are developed and driven to a high standard, are locally relevant and tie into global business goals, have clear objectives and a measurable return on investment. 

-  Be a generator of ideas for local execution and also implement global campaigns in a way that meets the high Apple standards.

-  Work closely with our business and editorial teams to build iconic and impactful campaigns.

-  Define clear and tangible marketing priorities and monitor / partner around detailed execution.

-  Run and expand business relationships with existing marketing partners & targets.

Minimum Qualifications
Marketing experience in content services and subscriptions, with deep knowledge of owned, digital and above-the-line marketing channels.
Experience working collaboratively in a global company, a natural networker who will develop and build positive relationships with business partners and stakeholders.
Have an ability to analyse and communicate results to leaders in both written and oral formats, and capable of understanding Apple’s overall priorities.
Outstanding organisational skills and the ability to balance multiple projects simultaneously.
Proven ability to manage deadlines and work effectively with cross-functional teams under daily and weekly deadlines.
Deep passion for the Apple brand, Apple’s first party subscription products, and mobile technology.
Strong leadership and communication skills.
Fluency in English is a requirement.
Resourceful, creative, and collaborative.
Preferred Qualifications
Additional languages are a plus.
Creator marketing experience is a plus.
